title: 【Unturned】3.11.6.0更新
author: Yihc
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Yihc 于 2015-7-16 14:26 编辑 

原文：
Additions: 
Added documentation on sights, tacticals, grips, barrels, magazines, fuels, fertilizers, optics, canteens, fishers, structures, barricades, storage, farms and traps: 
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=470771503Added documentation on other miscellaneous content: 
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=481212147
Improvements: 
Improved zombies to wander around every once and a while.Improved singleplayer to save the current time, and start by default at dawn.Improved clothing to track state allowing night vision to save whether it was on or off.
Fixes: 
Fixed relay servers not being used.Fixed build type naming convention.Fixed wheel force application distance.Fixed despawning items away from spawn points.






翻译：
添加: 
添加了各种物品的文档(估计是记录更新吧): 
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=470771503添加了其他物品的文档: 
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=481212147
改进: 
改进了丧尸每隔一段时间会到处游荡.改进了单人模式会保存当前时间,每次开始时会在黎明时刻.改进了能保存夜视仪的开启或关闭状态(下次进游戏将会读取上次夜视仪的开关状态).
修复: 
修复了读取服务器无法使用(Fixed relay servers not being used).修复了生成类型命名约.修复了轮胎的转弯距离(Fixed wheel force application distance).修复了物资离出生点太远.



这次作者的修复都不知道什么鬼，有错指出，特别是修复那块。。
